text:
We are using apache version 2.4.25 in our development and sometimes we are getting following error at bootup which caused apache service to be unavailable.

AH01239: cgid daemon process died, restarting                                                               
[unixd:alert] [pid 548:tid 3069939456] AH02155: getpwuid: couldn't determine user name from uid -1, you probably need to modify the User directive
[cgid:error] [pid 401:tid 3070095104] (98)Address already in use: AH01243: Couldn't bind unix domain socket /var/apache2/logs/cgisock.395
AH00292: Apache/2.4.25 (Unix) configured -- resuming normal operations
AH00094: Command line: '/usr/sbin/httpd'                      
[cgid:crit] [pid 395:tid 3070095104] AH01238: cgid daemon failed to initialize                 


Is this a known issue or what?
creator: vivek.panchal@einfochips.com
